ARABIC: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I knew nothing of the Highest Assembly when they debated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I had no knowledge of the higher Assembly when they discussed it among themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Tell them): “I had no knowledge of the High Council when they were disputing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I have no knowledge of the dispute among the angels (concerning their attitude towards Adam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What did I know of the heavenly world, when the angels had disputed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I had no knowledge of the chiefs (angels) on high when they were disputing and discussing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I had no knowledge of the exalted chiefs when they contended:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I had no knowledge of the High Council when they disputed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I had no knowledge of the Highest Chiefs when they disputed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I had no knowledge of the Exalted Assembly when they argued [against the creation of man]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I had no knowledge of the chiefs on high when they disputed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I have no knowledge of the Supernal Elite when they contend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high, when they discuss (matters) among themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I had no knowledge of the chiefs (angels) on high when they were disputing and discussing (about the creation of Adam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I had no knowledge of the High Assembly's dispute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I have no knowledge of the Highest Assembly as they dispute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:69] I had no knowledge of the High Council, that is to say, [of] the angels, when they disputed, in the matter of Adam, when God, exalted be He, said [to them]: ‘I am appointing on earth a vicegerent’, to the end [of the verse, Q. 2:30].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I had no knowledge of the Highest Chiefs) i.e. of the angels, if it was not Allah Who sent me (when they disputed) when they spoke and said: (Wilt Thou place therein one who will do harm therein and will shed blood;
